articles.author: Sky
articles.title: COVID-19: British holidaymakers could be allowed to travel to Europe within weeks - Sky News
articles.description: The UK government's "green list" of countries for free travel is expected to be released this week.

articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: 185 new jobs in eight IDA Ireland high growth companies - RTE.ie
articles.description: IDA Ireland has today announced the creation of 185 jobs in Shannon, Galway, Dundalk, Cork and Dublin across eight high growth companies from Europe and the US.
articles.content:

articles.author: Rupert Neate
articles.title: Amazon had sales income of €44bn in Europe in 2020 but paid no corporation tax - The Guardian
articles.description: Despite lockdown surge the firm’s Luxembourg unit made a €1.2bn loss and therefore paid zero corporation tax
articles.content: Fresh questions have been raised over Amazons tax planning after its latest corporate filings in Luxembourg revealed that the company collected record sales income of 44bn (£38bn) in Europe last year… [+7054 chars]
